_header: When the day of doom shall be / It is in Gods privite
_description: On the time of Doomsday — 48 lines in couplets

BLAdd37049.First Lines:
When þe day of dome sall beIt is in gods
                    pryuyte…
BLAdd37049.Last Lines:
…Þerfore gracios god þat alle goodenes hasseGyf vs
                    þi mercy here or we passe
BLAdd37049.Note: Precede by prose introduction on the same subject.
BLAdd37049.Attributed Title: Of þe cumyin of þe day of dome
BLAdd37049.Editions:
Doty,  Brant Lee,
                        ed.

                Miscellany.”

Louis,  Cameron. 
             “Two Middle English Doomsday Poems.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         92 (1991): 43-6: 44.
